titles.title: Telephone Excise Tax Elimination Act of 2015
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise tax on telephone and other communications services.
Telephone Excise Tax Elimination Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Telephone Excise Tax Elimination Act of 2015
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the excise tax on communication services (i.e., local telephone service, toll telephone service, and teletypewriter exchange service).
